lines: 1. Ndiyimba mu Mtima mokondwa! Ndi nyimbo yokoma, yoyera;
Ndiyimba za Yesu Mbuyanga, Anditonthozane phe!
Udzera kwa Yesu wokonda, Mtendere mu mtimamu.
2. Pa mtanda Mbuyanga nafera, Adandicotsera zocimwa;
3. Pomsankha Yesuyo Mbuyanga, Mtendere walowa mu Mtima;
4. Pokonda Yesuyo, mtendere, Ku nthawi zosatha mtendere;
Potsata Mbuyanga apatsa, Mtendere mu mtimamu.
